theme: [Order 2] Loss of Control & Impact: A vehicle loses control and subsequently hits a stationary object.

inducer_details.subject: A rear-wheel-drive sedan
inducer_details.key_action: Takes a turn slightly too fast on the icy road, causing the rear to fishtail.

accident_details.direct_damage: Unable to recover from the skid, the vehicle veers directly off the road and slams into a pine tree, crumpling its front end.

inducer_details.subject: An SUV with a high center of gravity
inducer_details.key_action: The front-left tire suddenly blows out at high speed.

accident_details.direct_damage: The blowout causes the vehicle to pull sharply to the left. The driver overcorrects, loses control, and the SUV rolls multiple times before crashing into the central divider.

inducer_details.subject: A sports car
inducer_details.key_action: Accelerates too quickly into a turn on a waterlogged road, causing it to hydroplane.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle becomes completely unresponsive, careening tangentially off the road, over the curb, and smashes through the glass facade of a corner cafe.

inducer_details.subject: An MPV
inducer_details.key_action: Swerves violently to avoid a large dog that suddenly ran onto the expressway.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle loses control, goes off the embankment, slides across the grass, and collides sideways with a lamppost.

theme: [Order 2] Collision Chain Reaction: An initial collision that triggers a secondary collision.

inducer.description: Failure of Traffic Infrastructure (Traffic Light Malfunction)

inducer_details.subject: Multiple cars
inducer_details.key_action: With the traffic lights out, an SUV runs the intersection and T-bones a sedan.

accident_details.direct_damage: The impacted sedan is sent spinning and is pushed forward, striking the rear of another car waiting at the light.

inducer_details.subject: Multiple cars
inducer_details.key_action: A rear-end collision occurs due to extremely poor visibility in a downpour.

accident_details.direct_damage: The force of the impact shoves the lead car into the adjacent lane, causing it to sideswipe a vehicle traveling alongside.

inducer_details.subject: A heavy-duty truck
inducer_details.key_action: The truck's brakes fail, causing it to rear-end the small sedan in front of it.

accident_details.direct_damage: The immense force pushes the small sedan directly into the oncoming lane, where it collides head-on with a van.

inducer.description: Sudden Obstacle (Pedestrian / Non-motorized Vehicle Darting Out)

inducer_details.subject: A sedan and a bicycle
inducer_details.key_action: The sedan hits a bicycle that suddenly darted out.

accident_details.direct_damage: After the collision, the sedan brakes to a hard stop, causing a closely following vehicle to rear-end it.

theme: [Order 2] Collision leading to a Single Vehicle Incident

inducer.description: Sudden Drop in Visibility (Dense Fog / Haze)

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Telephoto smartphone footage from a driver on the roadside

inducer_details.subject: An electric vehicle
inducer_details.key_action: Is violently rear-ended by a truck in dense fog.

accident_details.direct_damage: The rear-end impact damages the vehicle's battery pack, which begins to smoke and then ignites a few minutes after the collision.

inducer_details.subject: A truck transporting paint
inducer_details.key_action: Swerves sharply to avoid a pothole, causing the vehicle to lose control.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle hits the roadside guardrail, and the violent impact causes paint cans on the truck to overturn and rupture, spilling colorful paint all over the road.

inducer_details.subject: An old sedan
inducer_details.key_action: Loses control on a wet corner.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle slides off the road and hits a tree. Although the impact is not severe, it damages the engine or electrical system, and the car cannot be restarted.

inducer.description: Failure of Traffic Infrastructure (Traffic Light Malfunction)

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Distant surveillance footage (capturing the explosion's flash)

inducer_details.subject: A sedan and a natural gas taxi
inducer_details.key_action: The traffic light malfunctions, and a car T-bones the taxi at high speed.

accident_details.direct_damage: The violent impact damages the taxi's natural gas tank or lines, and the leaking gas is ignited by sparks from the crash, causing a massive explosion.

theme: [Order 2] Infrastructure Failure causing a Collision

inducer.description: Failure of Traffic Infrastructure (Traffic Light Malfunction)

inducer_details.subject: A sedan and an SUV
inducer_details.key_action: A signal light malfunction causes the two vehicles to collide in a T-bone impact.

accident_details.direct_damage: The impacted sedan loses control, spins onto the sidewalk, and is stopped by a large tree.

inducer.description: Failure of Traffic Infrastructure (Widespread Streetlight / Tunnel Lighting Failure)

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Tunnel surveillance camera (footage suddenly goes black)

inducer_details.subject: Multiple cars
inducer_details.key_action: The tunnel lighting suddenly cuts out, and the lead car brakes hard.

accident_details.direct_damage: The following car rear-ends it, pushing it into the tunnel wall/guardrail.

inducer.description: Failure of Traffic Infrastructure (Traffic Light Malfunction)

inducer_details.subject: Two sedans
inducer_details.key_action: Both the reversible lane indicator and the main traffic light fail, causing two cars to mistakenly enter the same lane from opposite directions.

accident_details.direct_damage: The two cars collide head-on in the same lane, with one rolling over due to its higher speed.

inducer.description: Failure of Traffic Infrastructure (Widespread Streetlight / Tunnel Lighting Failure)

scene.location: A mountain road with no guardrails

inducer_details.subject: Two cars
inducer_details.key_action: All streetlights are out, and two cars approaching each other sideswipe because they cannot see the lane markings.

accident_details.direct_damage: After the sideswipe, one of the drivers is startled and overcorrects, causing the vehicle to lose control and drive off the mountainside.

theme: [Order 2] Environmental Factor causing Loss of Control

accident_chain: B34: Collision with Obstacle on Road
configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Trailing car's dashcam (wipers at max speed)

inducer_details.subject: An SUV
inducer_details.key_action: Loses control and rolls over while driving at high speed through deep standing water.

accident_details.direct_damage: The overturned SUV slides along the road and crashes into a vehicle stopped from a previous accident.

inducer_details.subject: A truck
inducer_details.key_action: Strong crosswinds and low visibility cause the truck to lose control.

accident_details.direct_damage: The out-of-control truck runs off the road and hits a pedestrian who was taking shelter from the sandstorm.

inducer.description: Deteriorating Road Conditions (Oil Slick / Chemical Spill)

inducer_details.subject: A motorcycle
inducer_details.key_action: Hits a large oil slick on a curve, instantly losing all traction.

accident_details.direct_damage: The motorcycle slides uncontrollably to the outside of the curve, with both rider and bike hitting the guardrail.

inducer.description: Sudden Drop in Visibility (Dense Fog / Haze)

inducer_details.subject: A truck and a sedan
inducer_details.key_action: An overturned truck from a previous accident is nearly invisible in the fog.

accident_details.direct_damage: A following sedan fails to spot the overturned truck in time and rear-ends it at high speed.

theme: [Order 2] Obstacle Evasion leading to Chain Collision

accident_chain: B34: Collision with Obstacle on Road

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: A sedan hits a mattress that fell from a truck ahead and brakes hard.

accident_details.direct_damage: After hitting the large obstacle, the car comes to a sudden stop and is rear-ended by a closely following vehicle.

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: A piece of building facade falls onto the road, and the driver swerves sharply to avoid it.

accident_details.direct_damage: While swerving, the vehicle mounts the curb and simultaneously sideswipes an adjacent car.

inducer_details.subject: An SUV
inducer_details.key_action: Changes lanes to avoid an animal and sideswipes a car in the process.

accident_details.direct_damage: After the sideswipe, the vehicle loses control and hits the guardrail on the opposite side of the road.

inducer_details.subject: A van with a high center of gravity
inducer_details.key_action: Brakes hard and swerves at a crosswalk to avoid a pedestrian running a red light.

accident_details.direct_damage: The side of the vehicle hits the pedestrian, and the sharp evasive maneuver causes the van to become unstable and roll over.

theme: [Order 2] System Failure leading to Collision

composition.description: Loss of Control or Secondary Impact

inducer_details.subject: A heavy truck
inducer_details.key_action: Speeds into traffic ahead after its brakes fail.

accident_details.direct_damage: The truck rear-ends multiple vehicles before running off the road and crashing into a house.

inducer_details.subject: An SUV
inducer_details.key_action: The vehicle on the left has a sudden blowout and veers uncontrollably to the right.

accident_details.direct_damage: The SUV with the blown tire sideswipes a sedan in the right lane, then continues to lose control and runs off the road.

inducer_details.subject: An old truck
inducer_details.key_action: The engine suddenly dies on the incline, and the truck begins to roll backward without control.

accident_details.direct_damage: The rolling truck veers diagonally, hits an oncoming vehicle, and then rolls over from the impact.

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Dashcam of the car that was hit

inducer_details.subject: A truck and a sedan
inducer_details.key_action: A wheel detaches from a truck, flies across the median, and strikes an oncoming sedan, causing the driver to lose control.

accident_details.direct_damage: The out-of-control sedan is then rear-ended by the car that was following it, while the runaway wheel continues to cause chaos.

theme: [Order 2] Collision pushing a vehicle into a Person

inducer.description: Failure of Traffic Infrastructure (Traffic Light Malfunction)

inducer_details.subject: A sedan and a truck
inducer_details.key_action: A signal malfunction causes a T-bone collision between the sedan and truck.

accident_details.direct_damage: The impacted sedan loses control and is pushed onto the sidewalk, striking pedestrians waiting to cross.

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: Rear-ends a vehicle ahead on the wet road.

accident_details.direct_damage: After the rear-end collision, the at-fault vehicle swerves to avoid a second impact and drives into the bike lane, hitting a cyclist.

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Shaky smartphone footage from a pedestrian bystander

inducer_details.subject: Two sedans
inducer_details.key_action: Two cars sideswipe each other while passing on a narrow street due to poor visibility.

accident_details.direct_damage: One of the startled drivers mistakenly hits the accelerator, causing the car to lurch forward into pedestrians taking shelter under an awning.

inducer_details.subject: A truck
inducer_details.key_action: A truck with brake failure rear-ends a sedan.

accident_details.direct_damage: The sedan is pushed forward by the impact and hits a motorcycle waiting to make a left turn ahead.

theme: [Order 2] Road Damage leading to Loss of Control and Collision

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: Loses control after swerving violently to avoid a pothole.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle loses control, crosses the centerline, and collides head-on with an oncoming car.

inducer_details.subject: An SUV
inducer_details.key_action: One side of the vehicle's wheels sink into a subsided section of the road, causing it to become instantly unbalanced.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle rolls over due to the imbalance, and a following car, unable to stop, rear-ends the overturned SUV.

inducer_details.subject: A truck
inducer_details.key_action: The truck loses control after being launched by a water-filled pothole on a curve.

accident_details.direct_damage: The out-of-control truck drifts to the outside and sideswipes a sedan driving normally in the outer lane.

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: A subsided expansion joint on the bridge causes the vehicle to jolt violently.

accident_details.direct_damage: The jolt causes the vehicle to lose control and hit the side barrier of the bridge.

theme: [Order 2] Low Visibility leading to a Chain Collision

inducer.description: Sudden Drop in Visibility (Dense Fog / Haze)

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Front and rear dashcam of the middle vehicle

inducer_details.subject: Three sedans
inducer_details.key_action: In dense fog, the middle vehicle rear-ends the one in front.

accident_details.direct_damage: After rear-ending the front car, the middle vehicle is then rear-ended by the car behind it, creating a 'sandwich' collision.

inducer_details.subject: Two sedans
inducer_details.key_action: A car makes an illegal lane change in the rain, sideswiping another car.

accident_details.direct_damage: The two cars stop in the road after the sideswipe, and a following vehicle, due to poor visibility and a slippery road, rear-ends one of the stopped cars.

inducer_details.subject: Multiple cars
inducer_details.key_action: A car overtakes in a sandstorm and collides head-on with an oncoming vehicle.

accident_details.direct_damage: After the head-on collision, following vehicles with low visibility crash into the accident scene, forming a multi-vehicle pile-up.

inducer.description: Sudden Drop in Visibility (Dense Fog / Haze)

accident_chain: B34: Collision with Obstacle on Road

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: Hits an overturned truck from a previous accident in dense fog.

accident_details.direct_damage: After hitting the obstacle, a following car, also with poor visibility, rear-ends the sedan.

theme: [Order 2] Obstacle Evasion leading to Loss of Control

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: Swerves violently to avoid a large iron block on the road.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle loses control, runs off the road, and hits a roadside tree.

inducer_details.subject: An SUV
inducer_details.key_action: Swerves sharply to avoid a herd of deer that suddenly appeared.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle loses control due to the excessive steering input, rolls over, and hits the guardrail.

inducer_details.subject: A convertible
inducer_details.key_action: A billboard falls from the sky, and the driver is startled and swerves sharply.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle loses control, mounts the sidewalk, and crashes into a shop window.

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: An emergency swerve to avoid a pedestrian running a red light.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle loses control and hits the curb, damaging its tires and suspension.

theme: [Order 2] Deteriorating Road causing Loss of Control and Collision

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: Loses control and crosses the centerline after hydroplaning at high speed.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle loses control and collides head-on with an oncoming car.

inducer_details.subject: An SUV
inducer_details.key_action: Loses control and rolls over on an oily corner.

accident_details.direct_damage: After the SUV rolls over, a following vehicle is unable to brake in time and rear-ends the overturned vehicle.

inducer_details.subject: A truck
inducer_details.key_action: Loses control on the icy bridge, causing the vehicle to jackknife.

accident_details.direct_damage: The rear of the out-of-control truck swings out and sideswipes a sedan in the adjacent lane.

accident_chain: B34: Collision with Obstacle on Road

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: Loses control after swerving sharply to avoid a puddle.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle loses control, runs off the road, and hits a broken-down car parked on the roadside.

theme: [Order 2] Collision causing a Secondary Impact

inducer.description: Failure of Traffic Infrastructure (Traffic Light Malfunction)

inducer_details.subject: Two sedans
inducer_details.key_action: A signal malfunction causes a T-bone collision.

accident_details.direct_damage: The impacted vehicle loses control, continues forward, and hits the roadside guardrail.

inducer_details.subject: Two sedans
inducer_details.key_action: A rear-end collision occurs in the rain.

accident_details.direct_damage: The rear-ended vehicle is pushed forward, loses control, and hits a roadside lamppost.

inducer_details.subject: Two cars
inducer_details.key_action: A car loses control on the wet road and sideswipes another car.

accident_details.direct_damage: After the sideswipe, the out-of-control vehicle mounts the sidewalk and crashes into a shop.

accident_chain: B34: Collision with Obstacle on Road

inducer_details.subject: Two cars
inducer_details.key_action: A car loses control after a blowout and sideswipes an adjacent car.

accident_details.direct_damage: After the sideswipe, the car with the blown tire continues to lose control and hits a vehicle stopped ahead due to congestion.

theme: [Order 2] System Failure leading to Loss of Control and Impact

inducer_details.subject: A truck
inducer_details.key_action: The truck's brakes fail.

accident_details.direct_damage: To avoid hitting traffic ahead, the driver steers the truck off the road, eventually crashing into an abandoned building.

inducer_details.subject: An SUV
inducer_details.key_action: The SUV has a blowout at high speed.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle loses control, rolls over, and hits a roadside tree.

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: The sedan's steering fails in the bend.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle runs off the road at a tangent and hits the guardrail.

inducer_details.subject: An electric car
inducer_details.key_action: The electric car suddenly loses power while driving, and the steering wheel locks.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle is unable to steer, runs straight off the road, and hits a lamppost.

theme: [Order 2] Evasive Maneuver leading to a Secondary Accident

composition.description: Sudden Obstacle (Pedestrian / Non-motorized Vehicle Darting Out)

inducer_details.subject: Multiple cars
inducer_details.key_action: The lead car brakes hard to avoid a pedestrian, causing a rear-end collision.

accident_details.direct_damage: The rear-ended vehicle loses control and runs off the road.

inducer_details.subject: A sedan and a truck
inducer_details.key_action: A sedan makes an emergency lane change to avoid an e-bike running a red light.

accident_details.direct_damage: It sideswipes an adjacent truck, causing the sedan to lose control and roll over.

inducer_details.subject: A truck
inducer_details.key_action: Swerves violently to avoid a pedestrian who is illegally on the highway.

accident_details.direct_damage: The truck hits the guardrail and then rolls over due to its unstable center of gravity.

inducer_details.subject: Two cars
inducer_details.key_action: A car accelerates out from a side street to avoid an e-bike.

accident_details.direct_damage: Is T-boned by a car on the main road and then loses control, running off the road.

theme: [Order 2] Road Damage leading to Loss of Control and Collision with Person

inducer_details.subject: A public bus
inducer_details.key_action: A tire blows out after hitting a large pothole, causing the vehicle to lose control.

accident_details.direct_damage: The out-of-control bus mounts the bus stop platform, hitting pedestrians waiting for the bus.

inducer_details.subject: A mixer truck
inducer_details.key_action: The road suddenly subsides, causing the mixer truck to become unbalanced.

accident_details.direct_damage: The mixer truck slowly rolls over, crushing a bicycle in the adjacent non-motorized vehicle lane.

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: Loses control after swerving to avoid a pothole.

accident_details.direct_damage: The out-of-control sedan veers into the oncoming lane and hits a normally proceeding motorcycle.

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: The roadbed is undermined, and the road collapses as the vehicle passes over.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle gets stuck in the collapsed area, loses control, and veers towards pedestrians walking by the river.

theme: [Order 2] Collision causing Vehicle to Fall

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Surveillance camera under the bridge (looking up)

inducer_details.subject: Multiple cars
inducer_details.key_action: A car is rear-ended by another on a slippery bridge.

accident_details.direct_damage: The impacted vehicle is pushed by the immense force, breaks through the guardrail, and falls from the bridge.

inducer_details.subject: A truck and a sedan
inducer_details.key_action: A truck with brake failure T-bones a sedan at the ramp junction.

accident_details.direct_damage: After the collision, the sedan tumbles and falls from the ramp to the road below.

inducer.description: Sudden Drop in Visibility (Dense Fog / Haze)

inducer_details.subject: Multiple cars
inducer_details.key_action: A multi-vehicle rear-end collision occurs in dense fog.

accident_details.direct_damage: In the pile-up, a small car is sandwiched between two large trucks and is squeezed off the bridge into the sea.

inducer_details.subject: Two cars
inducer_details.key_action: A car suddenly changes lanes to avoid an obstacle and sideswipes an adjacent car.

accident_details.direct_damage: The sideswiped vehicle loses control, hits the guardrail, and falls from the overpass.

theme: [Order 2] Run-off-road followed by Fire/Explosion

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Shaky smartphone footage from a pedestrian bystander

inducer_details.subject: A sports car
inducer_details.key_action: A blowout occurs at high speed, causing the vehicle to lose control.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle loses control, runs off the road, tumbles in the grass, and catches fire after landing due to a ruptured fuel tank.

inducer_details.subject: A fuel tanker
inducer_details.key_action: Loses control on a wet corner.

accident_details.direct_damage: The fuel tanker loses control and runs off the mountainside, causing a massive explosion upon impact with the ground.

inducer_details.subject: An off-road vehicle
inducer_details.key_action: Runs off the road to avoid a herd of deer.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle crashes into trees in the woods and catches fire due to an electrical short.

inducer_details.subject: A truck
inducer_details.key_action: Brakes fail, and the driver steers into an emergency escape ramp.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle runs off the end of the escape ramp, tumbles down a slope, and catches fire from the severe impact.

theme: [Order 2] Rollover causing Cargo Spill

inducer_details.subject: A truck transporting fruit
inducer_details.key_action: Swerves violently to avoid a large pothole, causing the vehicle to lose control.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle rolls over due to instability, and its full load of fruit spills onto the road.

inducer_details.subject: A chemical tanker
inducer_details.key_action: Rolls over after driving too fast on a wet corner.

accident_details.direct_damage: The tanker rolls over, and its tank ruptures, causing a large spill of toxic chemicals.

inducer_details.subject: A truck transporting sand and gravel
inducer_details.key_action: Loses control after a blowout.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle loses control and rolls over, spilling a large amount of sand and gravel onto the road.

inducer_details.subject: A milk tanker
inducer_details.key_action: Swerves sharply to avoid a herd of cows.

accident_details.direct_damage: The tanker loses control and rolls over, spilling a large amount of milk onto the road.

theme: [Order 2] Collision leading to a vehicle falling into water

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: Loses control on the icy bridge.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle loses control and hits the guardrail; the immense impact breaks the guardrail, causing the vehicle to fall into the river.

inducer_details.subject: A public bus
inducer_details.key_action: Brakes fail, unable to slow down on a cliffside corner.

accident_details.direct_damage: The driver chooses to hit the guardrail to slow down but is unsuccessful; the vehicle breaks through and falls into the sea.

inducer_details.subject: A truck
inducer_details.key_action: Aquaplanes in heavy rain and loses control, hitting the guardrail.

accident_details.direct_damage: The truck breaks the guardrail and falls from the overpass.

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: Loses control while trying to avoid an obstacle.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle loses control, hits the guardrail, and tumbles off the interchange.

theme: [Order 2] Hitting an Obstacle, then Losing Control

accident_chain: B34: Collision with Obstacle on Road

inducer_details.subject: An SUV
inducer_details.key_action: Runs over a metal part at high speed.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle is launched by the obstacle and loses balance upon landing, causing it to roll over.

inducer.description: Failure of Traffic Infrastructure (Widespread Streetlight / Tunnel Lighting Failure)

accident_chain: B34: Collision with Obstacle on Road

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: Hits a broken-down vehicle in the darkness.

accident_details.direct_damage: After the collision, the vehicle loses control and crashes into the tunnel wall.

accident_chain: B34: Collision with Obstacle on Road

inducer_details.subject: A public bus
inducer_details.key_action: A small car gets stuck in a sinkhole; the bus hits this car.

accident_details.direct_damage: After hitting the small car, the bus loses control due to an evasive maneuver and mounts the sidewalk.

inducer.description: Sudden Drop in Visibility (Dense Fog / Haze)

accident_chain: B34: Collision with Obstacle on Road

inducer_details.subject: A truck
inducer_details.key_action: Hits a vehicle from a previous accident in the dense fog.

accident_details.direct_damage: After the impact, the truck loses its balance and rolls over.

theme: [Order 2] Hitting a Person, then Losing Control

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: Hits a pedestrian running a red light.

accident_details.direct_damage: The driver panics after hitting the pedestrian and mistakenly hits the accelerator, causing the vehicle to lose control and run off the road.

inducer_details.subject: A truck
inducer_details.key_action: Hits a bicycle on a wet corner.

accident_details.direct_damage: After the impact, the truck swerves sharply to avoid, causing it to lose control and roll over on the slippery road.

inducer.description: Failure of Traffic Infrastructure (Traffic Light Malfunction)

inducer_details.subject: A public bus
inducer_details.key_action: The traffic light malfunctions, and the bus hits a pedestrian who has entered the lane.

accident_details.direct_damage: After hitting the pedestrian, the driver swerves sharply, causing the bus to mount the median strip.

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: Hits a motorcycle while turning on a slippery road.

accident_details.direct_damage: After the collision, the vehicle loses control, veers to the side of the road, and hits a fire hydrant.

theme: [Order 2] Impact and Rebound Collision

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: The vehicle loses control on the wet road and hits the side guardrail.

accident_details.direct_damage: After hitting the guardrail, the vehicle is deflected back into the travel lanes, crosses the centerline, and collides with an oncoming car.

inducer_details.subject: An SUV
inducer_details.key_action: The vehicle loses control after a blowout and hits a roadside tree.

accident_details.direct_damage: After hitting the tree, the vehicle is deflected back into the middle of the road and is rear-ended by a following vehicle that couldn't stop in time.

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: To avoid a pothole, the vehicle hits the curb.

accident_details.direct_damage: After hitting the curb, the vehicle is deflected back into the travel lane and sideswipes a car driving normally in the adjacent lane.

inducer_details.subject: A truck
inducer_details.key_action: Steering fails, causing it to hit a wall.

accident_details.direct_damage: The truck scrapes along the wall, and its rear swings out, hitting the side of a vehicle coming from behind.

theme: [Order 2] Vehicle falls and hits an object below

inducer_details.subject: A truck
inducer_details.key_action: A truck's brakes fail on the top-level ramp, and it breaks through the guardrail and falls.

accident_details.direct_damage: The falling truck lands on traffic on the lower level, causing a multi-vehicle pile-up.

inducer_details.subject: A public bus
inducer_details.key_action: An overloaded truck causes the bridge deck to collapse, and a following bus falls.

accident_details.direct_damage: The falling bus crashes into a house under the bridge.

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: Loses control on the icy upper deck and breaks through the guardrail, falling.

accident_details.direct_damage: The falling sedan lands directly on a vehicle in the oncoming lane of the lower deck, causing a head-on collision.

inducer_details.subject: A motorcycle
inducer_details.key_action: A falling object from a crane causes a collision that throws the motorcycle off the overpass.

accident_details.direct_damage: The motorcycle is thrown off the overpass, falls into a park below, and hits a tree.

theme: [Order 2] Collision followed by Fire

inducer.description: Sudden Drop in Visibility (Dense Fog / Haze)

inducer_details.subject: Two sedans
inducer_details.key_action: An improper overtake in dense fog leads to a head-on collision.

accident_details.direct_damage: The violent collision ruptures a fuel tank and causes a fire due to sparks.

inducer_details.subject: A fuel tanker
inducer_details.key_action: Brake failure causes a multi-vehicle rear-end collision.

accident_details.direct_damage: In the pile-up, the fuel tanker is hit, leaks, and causes a large fire.

inducer_details.subject: A sports car
inducer_details.key_action: Loses control on a wet corner and hits the guardrail.

accident_details.direct_damage: The impact causes an electrical short, which in turn causes a fire.

accident_chain: B34: Collision with Obstacle on Road

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: Hits a fallen metal obstacle on the road.

accident_details.direct_damage: The impact punctures the fuel tank, and sparks from the scraping metal ignite the leaking gasoline.

theme: [Order 3] Deadly Chain Collision: A domino-effect pile-up triggered by a single impact.

inducer_details.subject: Multiple commuter vehicles
inducer_details.key_action: A car slows down on an icy patch and is rear-ended by the car behind it.

accident_details.direct_damage: The rear-ended vehicle spins into the adjacent lane, sideswipes another car, and is then pushed into oncoming traffic, resulting in a head-on collision.

inducer.description: Sudden Drop in Visibility (Dense Fog / Haze)

scene.location: Highway section with dense fog banks

inducer_details.subject: A massive convoy of vehicles
inducer_details.key_action: The lead vehicle brakes sharply as it enters a wall of fog.

accident_details.direct_damage: Vehicle after vehicle plows into the one ahead, creating a kilometer-long serpent of mangled cars. Many are crushed beyond recognition.

inducer_details.subject: A heavy-duty truck
inducer_details.key_action: The truck's brakes fail on a downhill approach to a red light with stopped traffic.

accident_details.direct_damage: The truck first rear-ends a sedan, propelling it into the intersection where it is T-boned by a passing bus. The bus, now out of control, veers onto the sidewalk and strikes several pedestrians.

inducer_details.subject: Multiple cars
inducer_details.key_action: A crate of industrial ball bearings spills onto the road, and multiple cars drive over them, instantly losing traction.

accident_details.direct_damage: Multiple vehicles lose control simultaneously, swaying and sideswiping each other, eventually piling up in the middle of the road as following cars also skid and crash into them.

theme: [Order 3] Loss of Control and Impact Chain Reaction

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: Loses control after a blowout at high speed.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle loses control, runs into the median strip, hits a tree but does not stop, and is deflected back into the oncoming lane, where it collides with an approaching car.

accident_chain: B34: Collision with Obstacle on Road

inducer_details.subject: A panel van
inducer_details.key_action: Loses control and skids sideways while driving too fast on a wet on-ramp.

accident_details.direct_damage: The van skids, rolls over, hits the outer guardrail, and continues to slide, hitting a vehicle stopped from a previous accident.

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Shaky smartphone footage from a pedestrian bystander

inducer_details.subject: An off-road vehicle
inducer_details.key_action: Swerves sharply to avoid a herd of deer.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle loses control, runs off the road, hits several trees in the woods before stopping, and the violent impact ruptures the fuel line, causing a fire.

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Surveillance camera on the road below (looking up)

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: Loses control and skids on the snowy bridge.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle loses control, veers out of its lane, hits the outermost guardrail, but due to its speed and angle, breaks through and falls from the overpass.

theme: [Order 3] Collision leading to a Deadly Fire and Explosion

inducer_details.subject: A sedan and a fuel tanker
inducer_details.key_action: A sedan's brakes fail, and it rear-ends a fuel tanker at high speed.

accident_details.direct_damage: The violent rear-end collision causes the sedan's front to catch fire, which quickly spreads to the rear of the tanker, eventually heating and detonating the entire tank.

inducer.description: Failure of Traffic Infrastructure (Widespread Streetlight / Tunnel Lighting Failure)

accident_chain: B34: Collision with Obstacle on Road
configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Tunnel entrance surveillance, the screen shakes violently then goes dark

inducer_details.subject: A truck transporting dangerous goods
inducer_details.key_action: The tunnel suddenly loses power, and the truck hits a broken-down vehicle in the darkness.

accident_details.direct_damage: The impact causes the flammable chemicals on the truck to leak and catch fire; the fire rapidly heats up in the confined space, eventually triggering a chemical explosion.

inducer.description: Deteriorating Road Conditions (Oil Slick / Chemical Spill)

inducer_details.subject: A tanker full of solvents
inducer_details.key_action: Swerves sharply to avoid an oil slick, causing the vehicle to roll over.

accident_details.direct_damage: Sparks from the vehicle scraping the ground ignite the leaking flammable solvent, creating a running fire that eventually leads to the tank exploding.

inducer_details.subject: A car
inducer_details.key_action: A heavy object falls from a nearby construction crane, hitting the car and causing it to lose control.

accident_details.direct_damage: The out-of-control car crashes into a gas pump, starting a fire that spreads and ignites the vent pipe of an underground storage tank, eventually causing it to explode.

theme: [Order 3] Obstacle causing a Chain Reaction

inducer_details.subject: Multiple cars
inducer_details.key_action: A car makes an emergency lane change to avoid an obstacle.

accident_details.direct_damage: The car sideswipes an adjacent vehicle, causing a following car to rear-end it, resulting in a three-car accident.

inducer_details.subject: Multiple cars
inducer_details.key_action: A car hits a pedestrian and brakes hard.

accident_details.direct_damage: After hitting the pedestrian, the car is rear-ended by two following vehicles in succession.

inducer_details.subject: A truck
inducer_details.key_action: Runs off the road to avoid an animal.

accident_details.direct_damage: The truck runs off the road, hits a tree, causing its cargo to spill all over the place.

accident_chain: B34: Collision with Obstacle on Road

inducer_details.subject: Multiple cars
inducer_details.key_action: An object falls from the overpass, and the SUV in front hits it and rolls over.

accident_details.direct_damage: The SUV hits the falling object and rolls over; a following vehicle is unable to brake in time and rear-ends it.

theme: [Order 3] Environmental Factors leading to a Pile-up

inducer_details.subject: Multiple cars
inducer_details.key_action: A multi-vehicle rear-end collision occurs in heavy rain.

accident_details.direct_damage: In the pile-up, a car loses control trying to avoid the accident ahead, runs off the road, and hits a roadside tree.

inducer.description: Sudden Drop in Visibility (Dense Fog / Haze)

inducer_details.subject: Multiple cars
inducer_details.key_action: A multi-vehicle rear-end collision occurs in dense fog.

accident_details.direct_damage: In the pile-up, a truck is hit, loses control, rolls over, and hits the bridge guardrail.

inducer_details.subject: Multiple cars
inducer_details.key_action: An icy road leads to a multi-vehicle pile-up.

accident_details.direct_damage: In the chaos, an impacted car loses control, veers towards the guardrail, and falls from the bridge.

inducer_details.subject: Multiple cars
inducer_details.key_action: An oily road surface leads to a multi-vehicle pile-up.

accident_details.direct_damage: In the pile-up, a car loses control, runs off the road, and hits a roadside building.

theme: [Order 3] Road Damage causing a Chain Reaction

inducer_details.subject: Multiple cars
inducer_details.key_action: The lead car rolls over after hitting a pothole.

accident_details.direct_damage: After the lead car rolls over, the following car rear-ends it, pushing both vehicles into the roadside guardrail.

inducer_details.subject: Multiple cars
inducer_details.key_action: A car swerves into the oncoming lane to avoid a sinkhole.

accident_details.direct_damage: The car collides with an oncoming vehicle, and both lose control and hit roadside trees.

inducer_details.subject: Multiple cars
inducer_details.key_action: A car loses control after hitting a water-filled pothole on a curve.

accident_details.direct_damage: The out-of-control vehicle drifts to the outside, sideswipes an adjacent car, causing the adjacent car to also lose control and eventually roll over.

inducer_details.subject: Multiple cars
inducer_details.key_action: A car loses control and enters the intersection due to a subsided road surface.

accident_details.direct_damage: The out-of-control vehicle is T-boned by a perpendicular vehicle, which is then pushed into a corner store.

theme: [Order 3] System Failure leading to a Pile-up

inducer_details.subject: A truck
inducer_details.key_action: A truck's brakes fail, causing a multi-vehicle rear-end collision.

accident_details.direct_damage: In the pile-up, the truck itself also loses control, hits the guardrail, and eventually rolls over.

inducer_details.subject: A passenger bus
inducer_details.key_action: The bus has a blowout, causing a multi-vehicle collision.

accident_details.direct_damage: In the chaos, an impacted sedan loses control, runs off the road, and hits a roadside tree.

inducer_details.subject: A public bus
inducer_details.key_action: The bus's steering fails, causing a multi-vehicle collision.

accident_details.direct_damage: After the collision, an out-of-control car mounts the sidewalk and crashes into a shop.

inducer_details.subject: Multiple cars
inducer_details.key_action: The lead car loses power, causing a chain of rear-end collisions.

accident_details.direct_damage: In the pile-up, a car is hit, loses control, breaks through the guardrail, and falls from the bridge.

theme: [Order 3] Collision, Loss of Control, then Hitting a Person

inducer_details.subject: Two cars
inducer_details.key_action: A car loses control on the wet road and sideswipes an adjacent car.

accident_details.direct_damage: After the sideswipe, the out-of-control vehicle mounts the sidewalk and hits a roadside pedestrian.

inducer.description: Failure of Traffic Infrastructure (Traffic Light Malfunction)

inducer_details.subject: A truck and a sedan
inducer_details.key_action: A signal malfunction causes a T-bone collision between the truck and the sedan.

accident_details.direct_damage: The collision causes the sedan to roll over, hitting a bicycle waiting at the intersection.

inducer.description: Sudden Drop in Visibility (Dense Fog / Haze)

inducer_details.subject: Multiple cars
inducer_details.key_action: A rear-end collision occurs in dense fog.

accident_details.direct_damage: The rear-ended vehicle loses control, veers to the side of the road, and hits a pedestrian walking on the roadside.

inducer_details.subject: Two cars
inducer_details.key_action: A car has a blowout and veers into the oncoming lane.

accident_details.direct_damage: After the head-on collision, one of the vehicles loses control, runs off the road, and hits a motorcycle.

theme: [Order 3] Loss of Control, Impact, and Falling

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: Loses control on the slippery bridge.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle loses control, runs towards the guardrail, breaks it, and falls from the bridge.

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: Brakes fail on the top floor of the parking garage.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle is unable to stop, crashes through the wall, and falls from the building.

inducer_details.subject: A truck
inducer_details.key_action: Loses control on a snowy corner.

accident_details.direct_damage: The truck loses control, rolls over, hits the guardrail on the cliffside, and falls into the ravine with the guardrail.

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: Loses control while trying to avoid an obstacle.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle loses control, runs off the road, hits a tree, rolls over, and finally falls into the river from the overpass.

theme: [Order 3] Collision, Loss of Control, and Impact with Stationary Object

inducer.description: Failure of Traffic Infrastructure (Traffic Light Malfunction)

inducer_details.subject: Two cars
inducer_details.key_action: A signal malfunction causes a T-bone collision.

accident_details.direct_damage: The impacted vehicle loses control, runs off the road, and hits a roadside tree.

inducer_details.subject: Multiple cars
inducer_details.key_action: A rear-end collision occurs in the rain.

accident_details.direct_damage: The rear-ended vehicle loses control, rolls over, and hits the guardrail.

inducer_details.subject: Two cars
inducer_details.key_action: A car loses control on the wet road and sideswipes another car.

accident_details.direct_damage: After the sideswipe, the out-of-control vehicle mounts the sidewalk and crashes into a shop.

inducer_details.subject: Two cars
inducer_details.key_action: A car has a blowout and veers into the oncoming lane.

accident_details.direct_damage: After the head-on collision, one of the vehicles loses control, runs off the road, and hits a lamppost.

theme: [Order 3] Loss of Control, Impact, and Fire

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Shaky smartphone footage from a pedestrian bystander

inducer_details.subject: A sports car
inducer_details.key_action: A blowout occurs at high speed, causing the vehicle to lose control.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle loses control, runs off the road, hits a tree, and catches fire.

inducer_details.subject: A truck
inducer_details.key_action: Loses control on a wet corner.

accident_details.direct_damage: The truck loses control, rolls over, hits the guardrail, and catches fire due to a ruptured fuel tank and sparks.

inducer_details.subject: A fuel tanker
inducer_details.key_action: Brakes fail.

accident_details.direct_damage: The driver steers the vehicle off the road, it crashes into an abandoned building and catches fire.

accident_chain: B34: Collision with Obstacle on Road

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: Loses control while trying to avoid a pothole.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle loses control, runs off the road, hits a broken-down car, and catches fire.

theme: [Order 3] Collision, Loss of Control, and Impact with Obstacle

inducer.description: Failure of Traffic Infrastructure (Traffic Light Malfunction)

accident_chain: B34: Collision with Obstacle on Road

inducer_details.subject: Two cars
inducer_details.key_action: A signal malfunction causes a T-bone collision.

accident_details.direct_damage: The impacted vehicle loses control, runs off the road, and hits a broken-down car parked on the roadside.

accident_chain: B34: Collision with Obstacle on Road

inducer_details.subject: Multiple cars
inducer_details.key_action: A rear-end collision occurs in the rain.

accident_details.direct_damage: The rear-ended vehicle loses control, rolls over, and hits debris from a previous accident.

accident_chain: B34: Collision with Obstacle on Road

inducer_details.subject: Two cars
inducer_details.key_action: A car loses control on the wet road and sideswipes another car.

accident_details.direct_damage: After the sideswipe, the out-of-control vehicle mounts the sidewalk and hits a telephone booth.

accident_chain: B34: Collision with Obstacle on Road

inducer_details.subject: Two cars
inducer_details.key_action: A car has a blowout and veers into the oncoming lane.

accident_details.direct_damage: After the head-on collision, one of the vehicles loses control, runs off the road, and hits a broken-down car.

theme: [Order 3] Loss of Control, Impact, and Hitting a Person

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: Loses control on a wet corner.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle loses control, hits the guardrail, and veers towards a pedestrian walking outside the guardrail.

inducer_details.subject: A truck
inducer_details.key_action: Brakes fail.

accident_details.direct_damage: The truck runs off the road, knocks down a lamppost, and continues forward, hitting a bicycle in the non-motorized vehicle lane.

inducer_details.subject: An SUV
inducer_details.key_action: Loses control after hitting a pothole.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle loses control, rolls over, hits a roadside tree, and affects a pedestrian resting under the tree.

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: Mounts the sidewalk to avoid an animal.

accident_details.direct_damage: The vehicle mounts the sidewalk, hits the wall of a shop, and injures a pedestrian at the entrance.

theme: [Order 3] Hitting a Person, then Losing Control and Crashing

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: Hits a pedestrian running a red light.

accident_details.direct_damage: The driver panics after hitting the pedestrian and swerves sharply, causing the vehicle to lose control, run off the road, and hit a tree.

inducer_details.subject: A truck
inducer_details.key_action: Hits a bicycle on a wet corner.

accident_details.direct_damage: After the impact, the truck swerves to avoid, causing it to lose control and roll over on the slippery road, hitting the guardrail.

inducer.description: Failure of Traffic Infrastructure (Traffic Light Malfunction)

inducer_details.subject: A public bus
inducer_details.key_action: The traffic light malfunctions, and the bus hits a pedestrian who has entered the lane.

accident_details.direct_damage: After hitting the pedestrian, the driver swerves sharply, causing the bus to mount the sidewalk and hit a building.

inducer_details.subject: A sedan
inducer_details.key_action: Hits a motorcycle while turning on a slippery road.

accident_details.direct_damage: After the collision, the vehicle loses control, veers to the side of the road, and hits the curb.

theme: [Order 3] Collision, Loss of Control, and Cargo Spill

inducer_details.subject: A truck
inducer_details.key_action: Loses control and sideswipes another vehicle on the wet road.

accident_details.direct_damage: The truck loses control and rolls over, causing its cargo of chemicals to spill.

inducer_details.subject: Two trucks
inducer_details.key_action: A truck has a blowout and veers into the oncoming lane.

accident_details.direct_damage: After the head-on collision, one of the trucks, which was transporting fruit, rolls over, spilling fruit all over the road.

inducer.description: Failure of Traffic Infrastructure (Traffic Light Malfunction)

inducer_details.subject: A sedan and a truck
inducer_details.key_action: A signal malfunction causes a T-bone collision.

accident_details.direct_damage: The impacted truck loses control, runs off the road, and spills some of its cargo.

inducer.description: Sudden Drop in Visibility (Dense Fog / Haze)

inducer_details.subject: Multiple cars
inducer_details.key_action: A rear-end collision occurs in dense fog.

accident_details.direct_damage: A rear-ended truck loses control and rolls over, spilling its cargo of industrial raw materials.

theme: [Order 4] Infrastructure Failure Cascade

inducer_details.subject: A fuel tanker and traffic below
inducer_details.key_action: A section of the overpass suddenly collapses due to structural fatigue.

accident_details.direct_damage: The tanker on the bridge falls with the collapsed section onto the traffic below, causing a pile-up. The tanker ruptures, spilling fuel which is ignited by sparks, leading to a massive explosion.

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Pedestrian's phone (capturing the fall) + distant high-rise CCTV

scene.location: A viaduct over a busy commercial district

inducer_details.subject: A public bus
inducer_details.key_action: The pedestrian walkway section of the viaduct suddenly crumbles and gives way.

accident_details.direct_damage: The bus on the viaduct falls with the collapsing section, landing on shoppers below. This triggers an emergency-braking pile-up on the street. The fallen bus ruptures its fuel tank and catches fire.

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Slow-motion close-ups in the style of 'Final Destination'

scene.location: The upper deck of a double-decker bridge

inducer_details.subject: A heavy truck carrying steel coils
inducer_details.key_action: The truck hits a massive pothole at high speed, snapping the chains securing the steel coils.

accident_details.direct_damage: A giant steel coil rolls off, causing the truck to lose balance, roll over, break the guardrail, and fall to the lower deck. The falling truck lands on a car in the opposite lane, causing a head-on collision that triggers a subsequent pile-up.

scene.location: A highway next to a chemical plant

inducer_details.subject: A tanker carrying liquid chlorine
inducer_details.key_action: The road subgrade, eroded by groundwater, collapses as the tanker passes over it.

accident_details.direct_damage: The tanker loses control, runs off the road, and hits the wall of the chemical plant. The impact ruptures the tank, releasing highly toxic liquid chlorine which rapidly vaporizes. The downwind gas cloud poisons nearby residents and first responders.

theme: [Order 4] Ultimate Chain Reaction from Critical System Failure

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Drone FPV tracking the at-fault truck

inducer_details.subject: A tanker truck carrying gasoline
inducer_details.key_action: The tanker's brakes completely fail on the long descent.

accident_details.direct_damage: The runaway tanker plows into slow-moving traffic, causing a massive pile-up. In the chaos, the tanker itself rolls over, rupturing and spilling gasoline. Sparks from the wreckage ignite the fuel, creating a sea of fire.

inducer_details.subject: A truck transporting live pigs
inducer_details.key_action: The truck suffers a tire blowout, loses control, and veers into the oncoming lane.

accident_details.direct_damage: The truck collides head-on with a car and rolls over, spilling its cargo of live pigs across the road. In the ensuing chaos, a loose pig runs into the path of a motorcycle, causing the rider to crash.

inducer_details.subject: A tanker carrying concentrated sulfuric acid
inducer_details.key_action: The tanker's steering system locks up while driving on the bridge.

accident_details.direct_damage: Unable to steer, the vehicle scrapes along the central divider, triggering a rear-end pile-up behind it. Eventually, the tanker overturns from the collisions, spilling corrosive acid that eats away at the bridge deck and other vehicles.

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: A 'Final Destination' style depiction of coincidences

inducer_details.subject: A truck and its detached wheel
inducer_details.key_action: A rear wheel detaches from a truck and rolls at high speed down the road.

accident_details.direct_damage: The runaway wheel strikes the undercarriage of a car, causing it to lose control. The out-of-control car gets T-boned in the intersection, which in turn causes a rear-end pile-up. Meanwhile, the original truck loses balance and rolls over.

theme: [Order 4] Environmental Hazard Chain Reaction

inducer.description: Sudden Drop in Visibility (Dense Fog / Haze)

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Disaster film perspective, combining POVs of firefighters and survivors

inducer_details.subject: Multiple vehicles, including a chemical tanker
inducer_details.key_action: A massive pile-up occurs in near-zero visibility fog.

accident_details.direct_damage: A chemical tanker is breached in the pile-up. Survivors get out of their cars but are hit by other vehicles in the ongoing collisions due to the fog. Eventually, the chemical cloud is ignited by a spark, causing an explosion.

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Documentary style, with interviews of stranded drivers

scene.location: A mountain pass highway closed by snow

inducer_details.subject: Hundreds of vehicles
inducer_details.key_action: A blizzard causes a pile-up, which then blocks the entire highway.

accident_details.direct_damage: Numerous vehicles break down after running out of fuel. A responding snowplow slides off the road. A stranded driver, walking to find help, is hit by another vehicle attempting to move in the whiteout conditions.

inducer_details.subject: Multiple cars and a fuel tanker
inducer_details.key_action: A car leaks a small amount of oil, causing a following car to skid and trigger a pile-up.

accident_details.direct_damage: During the pile-up, a fuel tanker is hit and rolls over, spilling a large amount of gasoline. The fuel mixes with rain and flows down the banked road. A spark ignites the fuel, creating a spectacular river of fire that engulfs multiple vehicles.

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Distant smartphone video (capturing a mushroom cloud)

scene.location: A road next to a grain silo

inducer_details.subject: Multiple vehicles and a flour truck
inducer_details.key_action: Extremely low visibility in a sandstorm causes a multi-vehicle collision.

accident_details.direct_damage: The flour truck is ruptured in the crash, releasing a massive cloud of flour dust. Sparks from the crash ignite the dust cloud, causing a massive fuel-air explosion. The shockwave destroys the nearby silo.

theme: [Order 4] High-Speed Pursuit Disaster

inducer_details.subject: A police car and a suspect vehicle
inducer_details.key_action: The police car's steering fails during a high-speed chase.

accident_details.direct_damage: The police car sideswipes the suspect vehicle, causing it to roll over. The rollover causes a pile-up of following traffic. The police car, now completely out of control, veers off the road and crashes into a building.

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: News chopper tracking a police chase

inducer_details.subject: A getaway car
inducer_details.key_action: The getaway car's tire blows out after driving over a spike strip.

accident_details.direct_damage: The car loses control and rear-ends a civilian vehicle, runs off the road onto a crowded sidewalk, hitting pedestrians, and finally catches fire from the sustained damage.

inducer_details.subject: A bank robbery getaway van
inducer_details.key_action: The van hits a large piece of debris that fell off a construction truck.

accident_details.direct_damage: Hitting the debris causes the van to roll over into the oncoming lane, where it is struck head-on by a fuel tanker. The impact causes the tanker to explode.

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: A mix of dashcams and shaky phone footage

inducer_details.subject: A stolen dump truck
inducer_details.key_action: The dump truck's brakes fail during a police chase.

accident_details.direct_damage: The truck T-bones a car in the intersection, runs off the road, crashes into a storefront, and the impact causes its load of gravel to spill all over the sidewalk and street.

theme: [Order 4] Collision Pushing Vehicle into Catastrophe

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Multiple angles from a bridge's scenic overlook

scene.location: A scenic bridge with a pedestrian overlook

inducer_details.subject: A tour bus
inducer_details.key_action: The bus's brakes fail on a downhill approach to the bridge.

accident_details.direct_damage: The bus rear-ends a car, shoves it out of the way, and then runs off the road onto the crowded scenic overlook, hitting tourists before crashing through the railing and falling.

inducer_details.subject: A truck and a car
inducer_details.key_action: A truck slides through a red light and T-bones a car.

accident_details.direct_damage: The impact pushes the car off the road, where it strikes a parked motorcycle, knocking it over, before finally crashing into the front of a cafe.

inducer.description: Failure of Traffic Infrastructure (Traffic Light Malfunction)

inducer_details.subject: Two cars
inducer_details.key_action: A malfunctioning light leads to a head-on collision.

accident_details.direct_damage: After the collision, one car veers off the road, hits a pedestrian on the corner, and the damaged engine catches fire.

inducer.description: Sudden Drop in Visibility (Dense Fog / Haze)

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Dashcam from a vehicle in the pile-up

inducer_details.subject: A cargo truck
inducer_details.key_action: A multi-vehicle pile-up occurs in dense fog.

accident_details.direct_damage: A cargo truck involved in the pile-up is pushed off the road, where it hits a parked maintenance vehicle and spills its load of gravel.

theme: [Order 4] Rollover into Secondary Disaster

inducer_details.subject: A fuel tanker
inducer_details.key_action: A fuel tanker loses traction and rolls over on a wet curve.

accident_details.direct_damage: A following car is unable to stop in time and rear-ends the overturned tanker. The impact ruptures the tank, spilling fuel which is then ignited by sparks.

inducer_details.subject: A truck carrying logs
inducer_details.key_action: A tire blowout causes the truck to roll over.

accident_details.direct_damage: The rollover causes logs to spill across multiple lanes, triggering a pile-up. One of the logs rolls onto the shoulder, striking a highway maintenance worker.

inducer_details.subject: A tanker truck
inducer_details.key_action: Hitting a large pothole causes the tanker to lose balance and roll over into the oncoming lane.

accident_details.direct_damage: An oncoming car collides head-on with the overturned tanker. The impact ruptures the tank, spilling its contents which then ignite.

inducer_details.subject: A truck carrying marbles
inducer_details.key_action: The driver swerves to avoid a deer, causing the truck to roll over.

accident_details.direct_damage: The truck rolls over and hits the guardrail, spilling thousands of marbles across the bridge. The marbles create an incredibly slick surface, causing a multi-vehicle pile-up.

theme: [Order 4] Run-off-road with Catastrophic Consequences

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Multiple security cameras at a gas station

inducer_details.subject: A fuel tanker
inducer_details.key_action: A fuel tanker's brakes fail as it approaches a turn, causing it to leave the road.

accident_details.direct_damage: The tanker runs off the road and crashes into the gas station building and pumps. The impact sparks a fire, which quickly leads to a massive explosion of the station's fuel reserves.

scene.location: Road adjacent to a power substation

inducer_details.subject: A truck
inducer_details.key_action: The truck loses control on the wet road.

accident_details.direct_damage: The truck runs off the road and crashes into a major electrical transformer pole. The impact causes a fire which leads to an electrical explosion and a regional blackout.

inducer_details.subject: A fuel tanker
inducer_details.key_action: The driver loses sight of the road in a whiteout.

accident_details.direct_damage: The tanker runs off the road and crashes into a remote lodge, spilling fuel that ignites and sets the building ablaze.

inducer_details.subject: A camper van
inducer_details.key_action: Swerves to avoid a deer.

accident_details.direct_damage: The van runs off the road, hits an embankment which acts as a ramp, and rolls over. The crash ignites the propane tanks inside, causing a large fire.

theme: [Order 4] Collision Pushing into Secondary Hazard

inducer.description: Failure of Traffic Infrastructure (Traffic Light Malfunction)

scene.location: A railway crossing near an intersection

inducer_details.subject: A car and a truck
inducer_details.key_action: A malfunctioning traffic light causes a truck to T-bone a car.

accident_details.direct_damage: The impact pushes the car off the road and onto adjacent railway tracks. An approaching high-speed train is unable to stop and collides with the car, causing an explosion.

inducer_details.subject: A truck
inducer_details.key_action: A truck with brake failure rear-ends a car.

accident_details.direct_damage: The impact pushes the car off the road, where it crashes through several market stalls before hitting a building, spilling goods everywhere.

inducer_details.subject: Two cars
inducer_details.key_action: A car hydroplanes and causes a head-on collision on a bridge.

accident_details.direct_damage: The impact sends one of the cars careening off the road, through the guardrail, and plunging into the water below.

inducer_details.subject: Multiple vehicles
inducer_details.key_action: A multi-vehicle pile-up occurs in a blizzard.

accident_details.direct_damage: One car involved is pushed off the road, where it hits a stranded pedestrian trying to walk for help, and then breaks down from the damage.

theme: [Order 4] Single Vehicle Failure with Complex Aftermath

inducer_details.subject: A tanker truck carrying crude oil
inducer_details.key_action: A tire blowout causes the tanker to lose control.

accident_details.direct_damage: The tanker rolls over, spilling oil across the interchange ramps. Following vehicles are unable to brake on the slick surface, causing a pile-up. The friction and sparks eventually ignite the oil.

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Dashcam from a car on the opposite side of the highway

scene.location: A highway with a forested median

inducer_details.subject: A logging truck
inducer_details.key_action: The truck's brakes fail on a long downhill stretch.

accident_details.direct_damage: The driver steers the truck off the road into the median to avoid traffic. The truck crashes through trees, spilling its load of logs. Some logs roll into the opposing lanes, causing a head-on collision and a subsequent pile-up.

inducer_details.subject: A double-decker livestock trailer
inducer_details.key_action: A catastrophic axle failure causes the trailer to detach and lose stability.

accident_details.direct_damage: The trailer rolls over, spilling cattle across all lanes of the highway. This causes a massive pile-up. A rancher who gets out to help is struck by a swerving car.

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: First-person view from a hazmat responder's helmet cam

inducer_details.subject: A chemical tanker
inducer_details.key_action: The tanker suffers a complete electrical failure, losing all lights and power steering.

accident_details.direct_damage: The driver is unable to control the vehicle, which runs off the road and tips over, spilling a corrosive chemical. A passing motorcyclist skids on the chemical and crashes. Sparks from the crash ignite the fumes.

theme: [Order 4] The 'Final Destination' Scenario

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: A montage of multiple dashcams showing an improbable chain of events

inducer_details.subject: A loose truck tire
inducer_details.key_action: A tire detaches from a semi-truck in the far lane.

accident_details.direct_damage: The tire bounces across several lanes. A car swerves to avoid it, sideswiping a large RV. The RV loses control, rolls over, and its momentum carries it through the guardrail, causing it to fall off the bridge.

inducer_details.subject: A crane and its load
inducer_details.key_action: A construction crane drops a large air conditioning unit onto the expressway.

accident_details.direct_damage: The lead car brakes hard but hits the unit. A following truck rear-ends the car, causing the car to roll over. This initial crash triggers a massive pile-up behind it.

inducer.description: Failure of Traffic Infrastructure (Traffic Light Malfunction)

inducer_details.subject: A logging truck
inducer_details.key_action: A malfunctioning traffic light causes a car to T-bone a logging truck.

accident_details.direct_damage: The impact snaps the chains holding the logs, causing them to spill. A car in the opposing lane hits the logs and loses control, causing it to roll over.

configurations.viewpoint_and_style: Dashcam from a car several vehicles behind

inducer_details.subject: A bus
inducer_details.key_action: A bus hits a deep pothole, causing a tire blowout.

accident_details.direct_damage: The bus loses control and sideswipes a car next to it. The car is pushed into the guardrail. The bus, unable to regain control, then also hits the guardrail and its weight carries it over the edge.
